title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Team Collaboration Human Resource Management Education Design Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners self-directively acquire core HRM theories in a flipped learning environment, achieving a pre-learning completion rate of 80% or higher
Learners evaluate their ability to analyze real HRM cases and propose solutions through TBL team activities
Learners meet online discussion participation criteria (minimum 3 posts) and experience a knowledge-sharing culture
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
